Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets for 57 runs, earning him the Player of the Match award
India scored 397/4, their highest total in ODIs against New Zealand
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammed Shami expressed his delight at his performance and credited the team's bowling unit for their success
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under floodlights at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai
Others: India won the match by 70 runs, securing their place in the final of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
